name: Time and Memories, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of level 1 or higher cards among those cards ×1000. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: Respective Choices, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Person to Make Happy" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, put up to 3 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1 level until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters put into your waiting room by this effect.
flavorText: So... I want you to choose a future with me.

name: Christmas Present, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When "Small Gig!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your other characters, and those cards get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1." (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: A Christmas present from me.

name: Together With Big Brother, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your 《Adolescence》 characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Well, I'll be going now.

name: Reunion Beyond Time, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your characters with "Sakuta(咲太)" in its card name, and exchange them as 【STAND】. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: You haven't grown too much.

name: Everlasting Summer Date, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 3 or more cards, this card gets the following 2 abilities. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn." "【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: You really love the ocean, don't you?

name: Relaxation Time, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 3 or more cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Resolute Statement, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 soul. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: I will keep living with you.

name: Close Sisters, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I don't need your permission. She's not yours.

name: Close Sisters, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand..
flavorText: Nodoka, you can step on Sakuta's foot.

name: Compromise, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage. 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
flavorText: Very well. If you insist on doing this, then I will stay here as well.

name: Crossroads, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Reunion Beyond Time, Mai Sakurajima" or "Evasion of the Accident, Sakuta Azusagawa" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on as the defending character. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Shoko(翔子)" in its card name, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
Shoko: "Sakuta-kun!"
Mai: "Sakuta!"

name: Evasion of the Accident, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock]". 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 "Crossroads, Sakuta Azusagawa" in your hand, reveal it to your opponent, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Going Home Together, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Memory When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if there are 2 or more cards in your memory, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: What's wrong?

name: Best Part About Winter, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: You're bringing out the kotatsu.

name: Younger Sister's Warning, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Adolescence》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'll never forgive you if you make her cry.

name: Preparing Dinner, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Unsettling Atmosphere" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, return it to their hand, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Call from Dad, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Adolescence》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: It was from Dad. He said Grandpa and Grandma really want to see me.

name: Numerous Memories
text: Put this card into your memory. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or an 《Adolescence》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if this card is in your memory, all of your 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power.

name: Seeking Help
text: Search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: Someone... Come on, find me...

name: Person to Make Happy
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Why... Why...

name: Small Gig!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Unsettling Atmosphere
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: What's the meaning of this, Sakuta?

name: Little Devil's Troubles, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters in your back stage ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: I don't flippin' get it.

name: Time and Memories, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. Ｘ is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have.

name: Visiting the Sick, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: Sakuta: "I brought Futaba with me today."

name: Coincidental Alignment, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Mai(麻衣)" in its card name, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 marker from underneath this card into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Mai-san's heart is residing right here.

name: Intermediation via Phone, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: I told you to not rope me into a bloodbath.

name: "My Theory" Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Shoko-san is about college age now, right?

name: Yearned-For Wedding Dress, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Seaside Wedding Venue" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Then it was worth all the time spent picking one out to show you.

name: Usual Conversational Exchange, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that battle opponent into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I'll inform Sakurajima-senpai that you were ogling me.

name: Cohabiting, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
flavorText: Take care.

name: Incident in a Dream, Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Adolescence》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Impossible Phenomenon" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Actually, I had a dream about you last night. A dream where you were in trouble at the train station.

name: Expression of Relief, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Adolescence》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: I'm so glad... I'm so glad you're alive.

name: "Which Senpai Are You?" Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Which... Senpai are you?

name: Arrival at the Destination! Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Right here!

name: Unexpected Destination, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I don't flippin' get it.

name: Favorite Phrases, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 "Returning Phrase" from your climax area into your waiting room] When "Returning Phrase" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My three favorites are "Thank you,""You did your best," and "I love you."

name: "What I Want to Write Now" Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: It'd be nice to find a wonderful boyfriend.

name: Encounter at the Hospital, Shoko Makinohara
flavorText: Sakuta: "Makinohara?"

name: Sudden Change in Condition, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Sudden Change in Condition, Shoko Makinohara" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Sudden Change in Condition, Shoko Makinohara" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Sudden Change in Condition, Shoko Makinohara" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your other characters, and those characters get +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My heart is the one inside your chest, isn't it?

name: Sudden Change in Condition, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Sudden Change in Condition, Sakuta Azusagawa" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Sudden Change in Condition, Sakuta Azusagawa" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Sudden Change in Condition, Sakuta Azusagawa" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Sakuta: "Makinohara-san!?"

name: Cleaning, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Encounter at the Hospital, Shoko Makinohara", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Encounter at the Hospital, Shoko Makinohara" from your hand into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I wonder if he's run into my younger self by now.

name: Incident in a Dream, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Reason for Existence, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: I was given a future by you, Sakuta-kun.

name: December 24
text: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 characters with "Sakuta(咲太)" in its card name, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your clock, and return it to your hand. Put this card into your memory.

name: Returning Phrase
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: You did your best, Sakuta-kun.

name: Impossible Phenomenon
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: There really is another one of you here, Senpai!

name: Seaside Wedding Venue
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Strange Incidents, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of your climax phase, if there are 3 or more cards in your memory, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn, 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: But, you were able to meet me because of one.

name: Taking a New Step, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: H-How is it?

name: Precious Younger Sister, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the stage, this card's card name is also regarded as "Kaede Azusagawa(梓川 かえで)". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Santa Claus Duo, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: If you do, I'll give you a present.

name: Cohabiting, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Good Morning Kiss" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Adolescence》 character, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Sakuta, help me out a bit over here.

name: Santa Claus Duo, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: In a Swimsuit, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 3 or more cards, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

name: Date Invitation, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: How about we go see the illumination at Enoshima?

name: Alone in the Dressing Room, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if there is a card in your memory, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Satisfaction Check, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Retreating From the Bloodbath, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Adolescence》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Just the Three of Them" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Thanks for the meal.

name: Unpleasant Prying, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if your memory has 2 or more cards, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×1500.
flavorText: Marrying Shoko-san.

name: Bitter Decision, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" "Irreplaceable Existence, Shoko Makinohara" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" or "Irreplaceable Existence, Shoko Makinohara" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Incident in a Dream, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Incident in a Dream, Mai Sakurajima" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"Incident in a Dream, Mai Sakurajima" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Incident in a Dream, Mai Sakurajima" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Visiting the Sick, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The Truth Revealed" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.
flavorText: What do you mean by that?

name: Strange Incidents, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I've had my fill of wild bunny girls.

name: Incident in a Dream, Mai Sakurajima
flavorText: She said she had a bad dream this morning. One where I got into a traffic accident.

name: Running Away From Home, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I got a small gig at a shopping mall in Saitama today!

name: Organ Donor Card
text: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: This is about all I can do for now.

name: Good Morning Kiss
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I can't wake up without my good morning kiss.

name: The Truth Revealed
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Just the Three of Them
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Well, please make yourselves at home.

name: Respective Choices, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Memory of First Love" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I will be waiting.

name: Reliable Friend, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Complicated State of Mind" is in your climax area, this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn, and perform the following action 2 times. "Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Nothing less from you, Azusagawa. Such a rascal.

name: Irreplaceable Existence, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or your level, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [(2)] When this card attacks, if "The Future They Finally Reached" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 3 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, put the rest into their waiting room, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, and this card gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yes, Sakuta-san!

name: Future Dreams, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Special Existence, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it on any position of your back stage.

name: Sudden Confession, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Besides, there wouldn't be a problem even if something happens.

name: Date Invitation, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Theory on the Wound, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When "Complicated State of Mind" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Reliable Friend, Rio Futaba" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Because two copies of your heart exist, when there should only be one normally, you have that wound on your chest, don't you?

name: Reasons for Attraction, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 3 or higher, this card gets the following 2 abilities. "【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room." "【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn."
flavorText: Shoko: "You gave me the opportunity to raise Hayate."

name: Date Plans, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 《Adolescence》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: You're grinning and stuff.

name: Nostalgic Topic, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: You were quite cynical at the time.

name: Contents of the Printout, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: She seems to have appeared in order to act out the future plans that Shoko wasn't able to write down back when she was in elementary school.

name: Wedding Dress Try-On, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Adolescence》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Your mouth is gaping open.

name: To Return to the Present, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power.
flavorText: Looks like the dose I snuck in is working now.

name: Homework Left Undone, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: That's why I had so much I wanted to write down for my future plans

name: "Unraveling the Superstring Theory" Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other 《Adolescence》 character in your back stage.
flavorText: That's a different string theory.

name: "Quantum Entanglement" Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 character with "Sakuta(咲太)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Senpai, what are you doing?

name: Checking the Printout, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Future Plans" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Marking Homework" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: There's more.

name: Ordinary Days, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters with "Futaba(双葉)" or "Sakuta(咲太)" or "Kunimi(国見)" in its card name, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Azusagawa, you really are such a rascal.

name: Bathing Hayate, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: But, I'm sorry... I said I wanted to adopt Hayate, but haven't gotten around to telling my parents yet.

name: "Quantum Entanglement" Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Tomoe(朋絵)" in its card name, this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Quantum entanglement...

name: Usual Conversational Exchange, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Eh? Why?

name: Incident in a Dream, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I was in high school, teasing and cheering you on at Shichirigahama Beach.

name: Worrying Over a Friend, Yuma Kunimi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other "Worrying Over a Friend, Yuma Kunimi" in your center stage.

name: Future Plans
text: If "Future Plans" is not in your memory, put this card into your memory. You may choose 1 card in your level and 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Shoko Makinohara" in your waiting room, and exchange them. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Memory When you level up, if this card is in your memory, look at the top card of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Marking Homework
text: You may choose 1 "Future Plans" in your memory, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Shoko Makinohara" in your level, put it on any position of your stage, put this card into your level, and that character gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Complicated State of Mind
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Azusagawa... I...

name: Memory of First Love
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: 6:-- p.m. on the 24th, at the entrance to Bentenbashi in front of the dragon lantern.

name: The Future They Finally Reached
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
Mai: "Sakuta?"
Sakuta: "That girl..."

name: Chibi Nodoka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Chibi Tomoe
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +3000 power.

name: Chibi Mai
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Chibi Kaede
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.

name: Chibi Shoko
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power. 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, all of your other characters get +1 level and +1000 power.

name: Chibi Futaba
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Adolescence》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your character direct attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Kind Smile, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: I'll make sure of it.

name: In a Yukata, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Adolescence》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: "Schrodinger's Shoko-san" Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
